coreAttributes.authorTag: An insignia discreetly embroidered into the patch's elastic band informs you that it was enhanced by someone named 'Boondock'.
coreAttributes.name: Vengeance's Seal
coreAttributes.description: A very ordinary-looking medicinal eyepatch, complete with elastic straps to hold in in place. It has been enchanted with a powerful arcane-booster by the angel calling himself 'Vengeance', so that he can amplify his immense destructive powers...

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hook)] the eyepatch's straps around [npc.her] [npc.ears], before positioning the pad over [npc.her] [npc.eye].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hook)] the eyepatch's straps around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before positioning the pad over [npc2.her] [npc2.eye].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(hook)] the eyepatch's straps around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before firmly positioning the pad over [npc2.her] [npc2.eye].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unloop)] the eyepatch's straps from around [npc.her] [npc.ears], before taking it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unloop)] the eyepatch's straps from around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before taking it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(tug)] the eyepatch's straps off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.ears], before taking it off.
